name: vk-link-target-controller
description: Allow you to link a post title from the recent posts list to another page (internal or external link) rather than link to the actual post page

scripts.update: ncu -u -x '@wordpress/env' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.phpunit: composer install && wp-env run phpunit 'phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/vk-link-target-controller/.phpunit.xml --testsuite default --verbose'

author: Vektor, Inc.
